description: Utao is exicted about her first visit to the peach. But a sudden storm makes the roof at the inn they`re staying at leak, and blasts hole in the building, forcing her to use Kukuri to save everyone... One day, Hibino encounters Aki at the library. Utao sees them together, and attacks him with Kukuri. Utao is forced to think about the the meaning of Aki`s words: "Our gods are only good for destroying and murdering".
